CARD.drawFaceUpHand.name: Draw Cards to Hand Face Up?
CARD.drawFaceUpHand.nameHint: Set to false to 'draw blind' (drawn cards appear in players' hands face down).

CARD.drawFaceUpTable.name: Draw Cards to Table Face Up?
CARD.drawFaceUpTable.nameHint: Set to false to 'draw blind' to the table (drawn cards appear on the table face down).

CARD.scaleX.name: Card Scale Ratio X
CARD.scaleX.nameHint: Adjust the horizontal size of card tiles in play. Values less than 1 make the cards smaller.

CARD.scaleY.name: Card Scale Ratio Y
CARD.scaleY.nameHint: Adjust the vertical size of card tiles in play. Values less than 1 make the cards smaller.

CARD.chbPrimaryColor.name: Player Hand UI Color:
CARD.chbPrimaryColor.nameHint: Background color for the hand's vertical bar control bar.

CARD.chbBorderColor.name: Player Hand UI Border Color:
CARD.chbBorderColor.nameHint: Background color for the hand's vertical bar control bar.

CARD.chbMarkedColor.name: Color Applied to Marked Cards:
CARD.chbMarkedColor.nameHint: Color of tint applied to card(s) in hand designated as 'Marked'.

CARD.chbXPos.name: Player Hand Horizontal Position
CARD.chbXPos.nameHint: Higher values are further to the right of the screen horizontally.

CARD.chbYPos.name: Player Hand Vertical Position
CARD.chbYPos.nameHint: Higher values are further up the screen vertically.
